commit message: Merge branch 'hotfix/3.9.1' into release/4.0

Bringing back the menu options for adding media in the post editor.

Added an option for the new media picker.

Increase the 2fa code allowance to 8 characters.

Fixes #2599

Merge pull request #2601 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2599-2fa-code-length

Increase the 2fa code allowance to 8 characters.

Returning to the post editor won't crash if Activity was destroyed.

Still an issue of re-loading existing media into the post upon return from the picker.

Local images are maintained after fragment is re-created.

WP library images are buggy
WP library images and local images working.
Removing potential race condition with WP image loading threads.
Use a placeholder image when thumbnail can't be decoded
